version_description:
- Introduces Videoblast Elements. Powerful Pre-Rendered videos for common uses to help you elevate your content.
- Adds a better local caching and previewing system.
- Adds the ability to access all your local Videoblast content through a PC.
- Bug Fixes and General Improvements.

- Adds support for multi scene templates
- Adds support for multi line templates
- General Improvements

- Optimizations for more templates
- General Improvements and minor UI fixes
